extendedInfo.description: ***I am sorry the app was not working for many people, but as of April 23rd, the app should be working well.***This app is in beta.  Please be forgiving as I work out the bugs.  I appreciate any feedback you can give me in the forums as I am using the public for testing since I am just one poor dude with only one Android to test on.  The more feedback I get, the sooner the app will be up to par with the iPhone version.  Thank you,Dan Chenemaildanchen@gmail.comThe Ron Paul app is the premier mobile application for following information regarding Ron Paul, the Campaign for Liberty, and free-market economic news.With this app, users are able to:-Learn about Ron Paul and his views on political and social issues-View news from popular Ron Paul related websites, major news networks such as the NY Times and the Washington Post, Google, Yahoo, Ron Paul's personal congressional website, and Digg. -Watch videos of Ron Paul in the news and in congressional hearings-Watch videos from many other free-market oriented sources-Listen to Podcasts from Ron Paul and other free-market oriented sources-Chat with other Ron Paul App users and receive updates on important activism posts.-Easily contact your politicians-Easily participate in polls, donations, and supporting or opposing legislation-Learn about Austrian, Free-Market Economics -Follow Ron Paul on Twitter and Facebook-Follow Ron Paul and free-market related blogs-Find popular Ron Paul promotional products-Find Ron Paul Meet-up Groups in your area-Find Tea Party and Liberty Campaign Events_________________________________________Who is Ron Paul? Ron Paul, an eleven-term congressman from Texas, is the leading advocate of freedom in our nation's capital. He has devoted his political career to the defense of individual liberty, sound money, and a non-interventionist foreign policy. Judge Andrew Napolitano calls him "the Thomas Jefferson of our day." After serving as a flight surgeon in the U.S. Air Force in the 1960s, Dr. Paul moved to Texas to begin a civilian medical practice, delivering over four thousand babies in his career as an obstetrician. He served in Congress from 1976 to 1984, and again from 1996 to the present. He and Carol Paul, his wife of fifty-one years, have five children, eighteen grandchildren, and one great-grandchild.Ron Paul, the New York Post once wrote, Ron Paul is a politician who "cannot be bought by special interests." "There are few people in public life who, through thick and thin, rain or shine, stick to their principles," added a congressional colleague. "Ron Paul is one of those few."******  Note from the developer  ********I have spent the past decade searching for the most credible sources of information that were able to predict major political and economic changes.  In my search I found Ron Paul, a true hero who has fought for our rights and freedoms for the past four decades, even when nobody seemed to notice or care.  Ron Paul speaks the truth and he has consistently forecasted global crises because he is a scholar of Austrian Economics and a clear understanding of how our Federal Government functions. If you are someone who is looking for truth and understanding, I have created this app for you and I hope you like it.Thanks,Dan Chen
